info.description: Submit workflows to be run on REANA Cloud
info.title: REANA Server

200.description: Ping succeeded. Service is running and accessible.

parameters.description: Required. Secrets owner access token.
parameters.name: access_token

type.description: How will be the secret assigned to the jobs, either exported as an environment variable or mounted as a file.

403.description: Request failed. Token is not valid.

get.summary: Get user secrets. Requires an user access token.

delete.description: This resource deletes the requested secrets.

parameters.description: Required. API key of the admin.
parameters.name: access_token

parameters.description: Optional. List of secrets to be deleted.
parameters.name: secrets

schema.description: List of secret names to be deleted.
List of secret names that have been deleted.

items.description: Name of the secret that have been deleted.

403.description: Request failed. Token is not valid.

404.description: Request failed. Secrets do not exist.

schema.description: List of secret names that could not be deleted.

items.description: Name of the secret which does not exist.

post.description: This resource adds secrets for the authenticated user.

parameters.description: Required. Secrets owner access token.
parameters.name: access_token

parameters.description: Whether existing secret keys should be overwritten.
parameters.name: overwrite

parameters.description: Optional. List of secrets to be added.
parameters.name: secrets

type.description: How will be the secret assigned to the jobs, either exported as an environment variable or mounted as a file.

403.description: Request failed. Token is not valid.

409.description: Request failed. Secrets could not be added due to a conflict.

application/json.message: The submitted secrets api_key, password, username already exist.

parameters.description: Not required. The email of the user.
parameters.name: email

parameters.description: Not required. UUID of the user.
parameters.name: id_

parameters.description: Not required. API key of the admin.
parameters.name: user_token

parameters.description: Required. API key of the admin.
parameters.name: access_token

200.description: Users matching criteria were found. Returns all stored user information.

403.description: Request failed. The incoming payload seems malformed.

404.description: Request failed. User does not exist.

get.summary: Get user information. Requires the admin api key.

post.description: This resource creates a new user with the provided information (email, id). Requires the admin api key.

parameters.description: Required. The email of the user.
parameters.name: email

parameters.description: Required. API key of the user.
parameters.name: user_token

parameters.description: Required. API key of the admin.
parameters.name: access_token

201.description: User created successfully. Returns the access_token and a message.

403.description: Request failed. The incoming payload seems malformed.

post.summary: Creates a new user with the provided information.

get.description: This resource return all current workflows in JSON format.

parameters.description: Required. The API access_token of workflow owner.
parameters.name: access_token

parameters.description: Required. Type of workflows.
parameters.name: type

parameters.description: Optional flag to show more information.
parameters.name: verbose

200.description: Request succeeded. The response contains the list of all workflows.

400.description: Request failed. The incoming payload seems malformed.

403.description: Request failed. User is not allowed to access workflow.

application/json.message: User 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 is not allowed to access workflow 256b25f4-4cfb-4684-b7a8-73872ef455a1

404.description: Request failed. User does not exist.

get.summary: Returns list of all current workflows in REANA.

post.description: This resource is expecting a REANA specification in JSON format with all the necessary information to instantiate a workflow.

parameters.description: Name of the workflow to be created. If not provided name will be generated.
parameters.name: workflow_name

parameters.description: Remote repository which contains a valid REANA specification.
parameters.name: spec

parameters.description: REANA specification with necessary data to instantiate a workflow.
parameters.name: reana_specification

parameters.description: Required. The API access_token of workflow owner.
parameters.name: access_token

201.description: Request succeeded. The workflow has been created.

application/json.message: The workflow has been successfully created.

400.description: Request failed. The incoming payload seems malformed

403.description: Request failed. User is not allowed to access workflow.

application/json.message: User 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 is not allowed to access workflow 256b25f4-4cfb-4684-b7a8-73872ef455a1

404.description: Request failed. User does not exist.

post.summary: Creates a new workflow based on a REANA specification file.

put.description: This resource moves files within the workspace. Resource is expecting a workflow UUID.

parameters.description: Required. Analysis UUID or name.
parameters.name: workflow_id_or_name

parameters.description: Required. Source file(s).
parameters.name: source

parameters.description: Required. Target file(s).
parameters.name: target

parameters.description: Required. The API access_token of workflow owner.
parameters.name: access_token

200.description: Request succeeded. Message about successfully moved files is returned.

400.description: Request failed. The incoming payload seems malformed.

403.description: Request failed. User is not allowed to access workflow.

application/json.message: User 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 is not allowed to access workflow 256b25f4-4cfb-4684-b7a8-73872ef455a1

404.description: Request failed. Either User or Workflow does not exist.

get.description: This resource shows the differences between the assets of two workflows. Resource is expecting two workflow UUIDs or names.

parameters.description: Required. Analysis UUID or name of the first workflow.
parameters.name: workflow_id_or_name_a

parameters.description: Required. Analysis UUID or name of the second workflow.
parameters.name: workflow_id_or_name_b

parameters.description: Optional flag. If set, file contents are examined.
parameters.name: brief

parameters.description: Optional parameter. Sets number of context lines for workspace diff output.
parameters.name: context_lines

parameters.description: Required. The API access_token of workflow owner.
parameters.name: access_token

200.description: Request succeeded. Info about a workflow, including the status is returned.

400.description: Request failed. The incoming payload seems malformed.

403.description: Request failed. User is not allowed to access workflow.

application/json.message: User 00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000 is not allowed to access workflow 256b25f4-4cfb-4684-b7a8-73872ef455a1

404.description: Request failed. Either user or workflow does not exist.

parameters.description: Required. The API access_token of workflow owner.

parameters.description: Required. The API access_token of workflow owner.
parameters.name: access_token

parameters.description: Type of interactive session to use.

image.description: Replaces the default Docker image of an interactive session.
